products.name: Vintage Custom Made Rhinestone Daisy Brooch Necklace
products.description: Custom made necklace using a rhinestone encrusted daisy brooch and a double layered shimmering matte gold chain. This is a set that comes with two separate chains that can be worn together or seperate

products.name: Custom Made Vintage Brooch and Freshwater Pearl Necklace
products.description: So so pretty, very sparkly, iridescent and colorful. The freshwater pearls are a petite size and have a good luster

products.name: Custom Made Necklace w/Vintage Rhinestone Brooch, Vtg Oval Cut Crystal Chain in Rolled Gold
products.description: Custom made necklace using a vintage snowflake shap rhinestone brooch. The layered chain has one strand made of oval faceted crystal encased in rolled gold and the other strand is made of brass oval links

products.name: Custom Made Necklace With Large Carved Black Stone on a Heavy Brass Chain
products.description: In person the stone looks blacker with no lighter color in the crevices of the carved lines. More of a solid black

products.name: Custom Made with a Gold Leaf Shell and Freshwater Pearl Chain
products.description: Very simple and pretty. Chain is made with freshwater rice pearls that have a very pretty luster.

products.name: Custom Made Necklace w/Gold Leaf Shell, Aquamarine Beads and Freshwater Pearls
products.description: Custom Made Necklace w/Gold Leaf Shell, Aquamarine Beads and Freshwater Pearls

products.name: Custom Made Necklace w/Large Horse Medallion, Glass Pearl Chain
products.description: Custom made layered necklace with a larger size horse medallion accented by faux pearls and faceted blue rhinestones. The layered chain is made of glass pearls and gold colored brass chain.

products.name: Custom Made Layered Necklace w/Antique Button & Pyrite Beads
products.description: Statement piece with large size antique steel and brass button, pyrite bead chain and shiny gold color chain.

products.name: Custom Made Vintage Brooch Necklace
products.description: Custom made necklace using a vtg brooch made of bright shades of pink rhinestones. The layered chain is made using both gunmetal and gold colored chain.

products.name: Custom Made Layered Necklace w/Large Vtg Brooch, Fresh Water Pearls & Vtg Filigree Findings
products.description: Wonderful custom made and designed necklace using a fabulous large brooch with a large center amber cut sparkly rhinestone. The 3 chains are made using vintage chain, vintage filigree findings and fresh water pearls.

products.name: Custom Made Necklace w/Large Vintage Rhinestone Flower Brooch
products.description: Custom made necklace using a large sparkly vintage flower brooch and chunky gold chain.

products.name: Vintage Sparkly Rhinestone Brooch & Vtg Chain Custom Made Necklace
products.description: Beautiful custom made necklace made by me ðŸ˜Š using a very sparkly vtg brooch with diamond brilliant colors of blue, green, red and pinks and a vtg link chain. No color loss or missing pieces.

products.name: Custom Made Necklaces w/a Vintage Spanish Damascene Brooch, Freshwater Pearls & Vintage Components
products.description: Fun & whimsical custom designed and made by me using freshwater pearls, vintage components and hand painted ceramic beads. Set of 3 separate necklaces that can be worn individually or together.

products.name: Custom Made Layered Necklace w/ Freshwater Pearls and Gold Tone Chain
products.description: Custom designed and made by me using genuine fresh water pearls and a freshwater pearl medallion cross.

products.name: Vintage Custom Made Necklace w/ Large Crystal Rhinestone Brooch & Multi Color Layered Chain
products.description: Gorgeous and sparkly with diamond fire of blues, greens, yellows and reds. Custom designed and made by me using a mix of chain styles and colors.

products.name: Vintage West Germany Blue Prophyry Glass Filigree Brooch on Vintage Napier
products.description: Sleek and simple but WOW, what a statement piece! One of a kind designed and made by me.

products.name: Antique Translucent Carnelian Stone Watch Fob Charm on a Vintage Double Layered Brass Chain
products.description: Gorgeous larger sized translucent Carnelian stone sphere held by brass petals. This charm was taken from an antique watch fob chain. The charm is attached to a double layered vintage brass chain.

products.name: Tripple Layered Vintage Brass & Silver Tone Large Bead Pendant Necklace
products.description: Chain and pendant are both vintage. Shortest length is approximately 17 inches. Message me if you prefer a different length.

products.name: Custom Made Layered Necklace w/Iridescent Champagne Colored Crystal Points & Matte Gold Chain
products.description: One of a kind necklace made with iridescent champagne colored crystal spear points on a matte gold colored chain. Length is approximately 17 inches with a 1 inch chain extender.

products.name: Custom Made Necklace w/Antique Celluloid Brooch, Carved Lotus Beads & Aquamarine Beads
products.description: Gorgeous one of a kind necklace with 1 inch chain extender. Necklace is made with an antique carved celluloid Asian style French brooch, two carved lotus flowers accented with genuine aquamarine beads.

products.name: Antique Delicately Carved Asian Medallion w/Blue Flash Laborite
products.description: Exquisite one-of-a-kind necklace featuring an antique, delicately carved Asian medallion as the centerpiece. The medallion is paired with a strand of blue flash labradorite beads, adding a touch of iridescent shimmer and elegance. A unique blend of vintage artistry and natural gemstone beauty.

products.name: Custom Made Necklace With Vintage Rhinestone Pendant & Shiny Vintage Copper Chain
products.description: Pictures don't do this piece justice. Wasn't able to capture the sparkle and range of sparkle color with pics. Beautiful and very sparkly. Large size rhinestones have a very pretty sparkle with a lot of fire like a diamond. Chain is very unique and has a lot of glisten and shine.

products.name: Vintage Hand Carved Genuine Amethyst Teardrop Pendant with 14kt Gold Plated Brass Chain Necklace
products.description: Carved genuine amethyst pendant necklace with vintage gold plated brass chain.

products.name: Large Gold Trimmed Jasper Stone on a Gold Plated Chain
products.description: Beautiful large Jasper stone trimmed in Gold.

products.name: High Luster Genuine Peacock Blue Baroque Coin Shaped Pearls w/Faceted Dark Copper Beads
products.description: Custom made by me ðŸ˜Š using high luster iridescent peacock blue baroque coin pearls. Pearls are separated by faceted dark colored copper beads. Length is approximately 17 inches.

products.name: Custom Made Necklace With a Rustic Gold Pendant and Tiny Faceted Pyrite Beads
products.description: Necklace with very sparkly tiny gunmetal pyrite beads and a rustic gold spear point pendant. Can be customized to any length you prefer.

products.name: Custom Made Vintage Hand Carved Amethyst Teardrop Pendant With Vintage Gold Plated Brass Chain
products.description: Beautiful deep purple hand carved natural amethyst on a vintage delicate gold plated brass chain.

products.name: Custom Made Necklace With Genuine Antique & Vintage Copper Charms on a Copper Chain
products.description: Stunning necklace with vintage copper religious medals and an antique copper medal from the 1800's. Length is approximately 17 inches.
